channel.title: dunst on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in dunst on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: mondo
item.description: I have a quite odd dunst setup. The file dunst/mondo is generated with mondo and contains the color definitions for dunst. By default i merge the mondo file with dunst/lo-bar . But I have a script that can merge the mondo file with a different file and by doing so creating a temporary alternative notification layout. lo-bar This layout displays a notification that only contains the summary (%s) in one line.
